fields.name: Daniel 9:9
fields.value: 9 To the Lord our God belong mercies and forgivenesses, though we have rebelled against him;

fields.name: Acts 5:31
fields.value: 31 Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour, for to give repentance to Israel, and forgiveness of sins.

fields.name: Ephesians 1:7
fields.value: 7 In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

fields.name: Colossians 1:14
fields.value: 14 In whom we have redemption through his blood, even the forgiveness of sins:

fields.name: 1 John 1:9
fields.value: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

fields.name: Summary
fields.value: God offers forgiveness of sins out of His abundance of mercies.
